title: Watch Thursday's Representing Border online
text:
Play video The government announce a temporary ban on another controversial gas extraction technique, but Ministers are under fire for delaying a final decision on fracking. And Labour keep up the pressure on the First Minister over the business dealings of the SNP's former business spokesperson.
